40055000.text: (How did the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon tribe</> get to the sea and moon continent?)

40055003.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>is managed to increase the number of animals. How about other places?)

40055004.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>If the expedition</> provided the land, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Reddon</> would also loot. I wouldn't have taken it)

40055005.text: (The crowd. You need to know the purpose of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</>)

40055006.text: (They are keeping the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> in check. Seems serious...)

40055007.text: (If you follow <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sura</>, then <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your Shinsu</> <textColor=[78] :148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> cannot be tolerated)

40055008.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The scorpion</> caught my eye. I'll have to look into it)

40055009.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpions</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mushrooms</> also breathe poison. That's dangerous. )

40055010.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Animals</>they're trying to protect the tree from people)

40055011.text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The field</> has <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</>. Why aren't there people around? ?)

40055012.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dim</> playing with riddles <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Planes of riddles</> giant)

40055013.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fox</>so it's strange that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> in a dangerous place. Let's investigate further. )

40055014.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fox</> has taken a seat. Why is this place abandoned?)

40055015.text: (The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> was abandoned because of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mandala</> cut from the tree)

40055017.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You are dim</> in the shade of the forest. So why did the forest exist?)

40055018.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Westin</> has been eroded by something. I doubt there are only dead trees)

40055019.text: (Forest lost vitality, lost reason <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Seoin</> all <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tarkite</ > It's your fault)

40055020.text: (The catastrophe happened and only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> are left...)

40055021.text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>No Greater Rift</>, but <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnhead</>. Why are they flocking here? is what?)

40055022.text: (Isn't <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burned</> not able to move because it is blocked by forest?)

40055023.text: (Probably the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>fertile land</> forest part was created to prevent <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>burnout</> maybe?)

40055024.text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>great fertility</>, it's strange that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>weeping</> is letting go. Investigation Let's do it)

40055025.text: (Is it because I saw the old disaster and knew the horror of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</>?)

40055026.text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Under excavation</> <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnout</> lair <textColor=[255] :204:102:255]>Have you given up on fertility</>?)

40055027.text: (The horns of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>deer</> here stand out. Should I investigate further?)

40055028.text: (I don't think it was caused by a bad influence. It's a red light that's captivating)

40055029.text:
(Is there a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Flowers</> here too?
Are you aiming for horns?)

40055030.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> aren't usually at the beach? Why are they here?)

40055031.text: (The more I look at it, the more comfortable I feel... Oops, I need to calm down)

40055032.text: (The colorful feathers of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tricolor</> seem to have changed with the forest environment)

40055033.text: (That pickaxe...? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Where there is no fertility</><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The miner</> Why are they there?)

40055034.text: (Maybe all these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>miners</> were digging through the rocky mountain?)

40055035.text: (The mutation that swept the area must have been a disaster. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Even the mutant</>mutated...)

40055036.text: (The aftermath of the mutation could not have been avoided by the administrators of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Exploration </>)

40055037.text: (The giant bugs might be worth investigating)

40055038.text: (I don't want to imagine seeing these <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>larvae</> all grown)

40055039.text: (Due to the rugged terrain, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ginseng</> are concentrated at the foot of the mountain)

40055040.text: (The signs of mutation are noticeable. What is the effect?)

40055041.text: (The cause of the heterogeneous color is the shape from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Termicite</>)

40055042.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Samyojeong</>'s mutation is progressing slowly. Full mutation will only be a matter of time)

40055043.text: (You might as well take a break and examine <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goat</>)

40055044.text: (I think only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goat</> can live on this huge rocky ramp)

40055045.text: (Soldiers were sent to secure access to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Dragon Carcasses</>...)

40055046.text: Is the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue People</> stronger near (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Giant Marbles</>? Let's investigate)

40055047.text: (I don't see any difference. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tarnish</>I don't think this has any effect)

40055048.text: (By the way, there are a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</> around here)

40055049.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</> were ordinary people before being changed by <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Takhoite</> I guess)

40055050.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spear gang</>I'm concerned about wandering around here. Shall we investigate further?)

40055052.text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]><textColor=[215]<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>base</> created by expedition</>
<textColor=[215 :94:94:255]>The spear gang</> took over)

40055053.text: (With such a tight security, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</> would be in trouble)

40055054.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The number of spiders</> is amazing. It's a bizarre group. Shall we check it out?)

40055055.text: (There were a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spiders</> because people didn't reach them)
